dialogues.speaker: Captain Orion
dialogues.text: Welcome, space traveler. I am Captain Orion of the Galactic Union.

dialogues.speaker: Space Traveler
dialogues.text: Greetings, Captain. We come in peace from the planet Earth.

dialogues.speaker: Captain Orion
dialogues.text: We have been monitoring your transmissions for some time now. Your species' capacity for both good and evil is... fascinating.

dialogues.speaker: Space Traveler
dialogues.text: We're not just one thing, Captain. We're a complex mix of emotions and experiences.

dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: As the two leaders engage in diplomacy, a sudden alert echoes through the ship's intercom...
